sub_title: Ambassador @ Rix Group AG |  Assisting top tier companies @ Lead Generation | Sales and Revenue Generation | New Business Development | Market Development | Key Account Management | Sales Strategy | Team Building
summary:
🌟 Igniting Growth Across Industries | Accomplished Business Development Leader 🚀

📈 Actively Pursuing Sales Leadership & Business Development Opportunities | Ready to Deliver Impact in 60 Days!

Hello! With a decade of experience across diverse verticals, I am a seasoned professional proficient in consultative sales, market development, growth strategies, and new business expansion. My journey spans Fortune 1000 corporations to non-profits, fueling my strategic insights.

🔑 Proficiencies for Success:

🚀 Consultative Sales & Market Development: Navigating complex needs, charting territories, sculpting bespoke solutions for growth.

🌍 Global Insights & Cross-Continental Expertise: Profound knowledge of North America, Western and Eastern Europe, the Middle East, Africa; driving market entries, strategic expansions, alliances.

🔍 Data-Driven Strategy & Informed Decision-Making: Harnessing analytics for accurate evaluations, shaping informed strategic choices.

🤝 Building Partnerships & Nurturing Alliances: Cultivating corporate relationships, forging strategic alliances amplifying impact.

📊 Elevating Revenue & Strategic Amplification: Elevating revenue, business expansion through innovative, results-oriented strategies.

💡 Innovation & Agile Adaptability: Thriving on innovation, adapting to evolving markets with agility.

👥 Leadership & Empowerment Through Mentorship: Inspiring teams to exceed targets, achieve shared objectives.

🌎 Global Impact & Corporate Landscape Mastery:

🌐 Traversing Continents & Shaping Markets: From North America, Western & Eastern Europe to the Middle East and Africa, my footprint spans continents.

🌆 Unveiling Market Potential & Architecting Expansions: Orchestrating seamless market entries, architecting growth through formidable reward campaigns resulting in increased revenue and market share. 

🤝 Architecting Corporate Relationships & Collaborations: Navigating intricate corporate relationships, fostering alliances, and managing key account

🌿 Driving Social Impact Through Not-for-Profits: Effecting positive change through not-for-profit campaigns, substantial fundraising, cross-border collaborations.

🔗 Let's Connect to Shape Success:

As I embark on the next chapter, I seek roles as a dynamic Sales Director, Key Account Manager, Business Development Director, or Business Development Lead. Connect for shared success!

📧 Get in Touch: anthony.nwosisi@gmail.com

Join me in sculpting growth, disrupting markets, and forging a legacy of accomplishment. Ready to co-create triumph? Let's shape the future we envision.

education.field_of_study: Information Studies - Track: Business Information Systems

school.name: De Haagse Hogeschool / The Hague University of Applied Sciences

profile_positions.description:
AREOPA is a knowledge provider, covering 5 ECO zones
• Change Management
• Risk Assessment & Process Performance
• Public Sector Governance
• Learning & Knowledge Management
• Intellectual Capital Calculation & Accounting

I am specifically responsible for managing sales within the Intellectual Capital Calculation & Accounting vertical assisting organisations to meet their sustainability objectives through the evaluation and analysis of an ESG(v) report. Furthermore, Aeropa adds a distinct aspect to its service by providing the future value of our findings which can be added to the balance sheet of the company.

Typical deal size 300.000 Euros, clients range from Fortune 500 companies to start-up's, scale-up and innovation organisations.
profile_positions.title: Strategic Alliances Director (The Netherlands)

profile_positions.description:
Pursuing the core agenda that ensures girl child education in Ghana, my role caters for drafting a plan that aligns the organisation's aims and objects with the Ministry of Education in Ghana, and the United Nations Social Development Goals. I am responsible for generating funding. measuring the social impact of the organisation's agenda and programs, and reviewing the measuring current measures in place to ascertain the efficiency and effectiveness.

Key Deliverables:

• Explore the expansion plan within the Global South
• Seek strategic partnership with organisations that resonate the ideals of GGG
• Raise funding and support from public institutions, NGO, and private organisations
• Meet with all stakeholders to discuss and formulate the way forward on the GGG agenda and its inclusion in the local plan
profile_positions.title: Strategic Business Development Director

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for bringing corporate institutions and organisations on board the alliance through pitching the benefits of how AMEA’s mission and vision tackles a varied number of societal challenges in the global south. With intensive global travel, I represented AMEA at the following conferences:

• World Cocoa Conference in Berlin Germany.
• The Sustainability Consortium Summit in Chicago, USA – where I delivered a speech and I was on a panel to discuss several issues.
• International Finance Corporation – IFC – in Amsterdam, the Netherlands.
Developed business strategies and concepts that forged a strategic alliance with Global Gap Cologne Germany, Rain Forest Alliance, Amsterdam the Netherlands, Church of Sweden, Cargill, Mars Inc. and Scope Insight, and Turn Around Africa,

Key Deliverables:

• Identified and established a robust list of potential partners and stakeholders
• Built stronger relationships with alliance partners and stakeholder
• Created value proposition to the customer segment
• Increased the overall sales efficiency and profitability of the organization
• Designed business strategies and concepts for possible expansion
• Lead marketing and communication team in the creation, design, and execution of relevant materials
• Supported the design and execution of local networks in their business development
• Established a very strong customer relationship management system – HubSpot – keeping track and oversight of progress on all leads.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Manager

profile_positions.description:
Was responsible for developing and maintaining a commercially productive relationship with old clients in Western Europe; equally, required to open new markets and sales channels in Eastern Europe, the Middle East, and Africa. Mandated to explore alternative opportunities that successfully led to increased revenue and profitability; identified and consistently prospected new supply lines within OEM’s, ODM’s, CEM’s, Content Providers, Server Farms, Cloud Storage, Social Media, and Search Engine Providers. Made a net sale of 2.8 Million USD, and successfully opened the following countries: Africa - Morocco, Tunisia, Egypt, Nigeria and South Africa. Middle East - UAE, Kuwait, Oman, Bahrain, and Saudi Arabia. Eastern Europe - Bulgaria, Romania, Poland, Latvia, the Czech Republic and Hungary. 

Key Deliverables:

• Developed an extensive Data-Base of All Clients within the Assigned EMEA region.
• Promoted company product offering to key buyers and ensuring that clientele knowledge was current and appropriate. • Drafted concise value-based sales proposal
• Generated new business via the email, face-to-face and over the phone.
• Ensured that all customer inquiries were responded to in an accurate and timely manner
• Wrote sales and activity report, made revenue forecast.
• Qualified potential supply opportunities
profile_positions.title: Business Development Manager

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for creating sales opportunities for the three chain restaurants [Dog 1, Dog 2, and Dog 3]; designed an online [social media] strategy that created awareness, increased sales and up-sales; ventured into the international arena to attract tourist in the city of Amsterdam
to come and enjoy the unique Australian cuisine.

Key Deliverables:

• Created business accounts which had on-site: Breakfast Menu, Lunch Menu, and Snacks.
• Designed Australia Coffee shots for alertness and concentration
• Designed and maintained a neighbourhood discount program
• Operated a frequent customer account targeted at building points that eventually gave discounts.
• Created events [Thursday, Friday, Saturday, and Sunday – DJ events] that pulled more customers.
profile_positions.title: Sales: Business Developer

profile_positions.description:
The faculty of Social Studies of the Hogeschool van Arnhem en Nijmegen had over the years noticed a variation between very talented students within its program and the ones that were lagging behind. To create a proper utilization of the pool of talent, the university wanted to use Design Thinking to design a curriculum that would effectively train these students so that can they be the best in their chosen field. 

In my capacity as a team member of 3 other consultants, we gathered data, processed it and derived information that was used to provide advice on the new curriculum path within the context of Design Thinking.

Key Deliverable:

• Interviewed Faulty Members
• Interviewed student from year 1 to 4.
• Examined course description and objective; compared with examination with the objective to find similarities. 
• Graded examination difficulty by examining pass rate and re-attempts.
• Submitted the proposed curriculum redesign to the faculty representative.
profile_positions.title: Business Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Explored the Africa market entry feasibility possibilities for Medicom Healthcare B.V. Specifically my task looked at Nigeria, Togo and Ghana with the primary aims of: setting up production sites at the most cheapest location, medical product direct sale or the use of an agent. 

In addition, the deliverable report provided a robust advice that covered: Market Entry Strategy per country, Pricing Strategy per country and the long term continent expansion advice plan for a 5 year period. The key product objective was to introduce company products into both retail store and hospitals. 

Key Duties:

• Identified current market competitors.
• Examined their product quality compared to company products.
• Examined local sales price with attention paid to the landing cost of products.
• Carried out a creditworthiness assessment of prospective wholesaler considered for distributing company products.
profile_positions.title: Sales Business Consultant in HealthCare

profile_positions.description:
Began the product introduction, sales and after service of the Kirby Multi-Purpose Cleaning Home Appliance. Achieved a sales of 500.000 US$; equally secured cleaning and facility maintenance service contract during the same period.

Key Duties:

• Identify Potential customers and conducted product demonstration.
• Retained customer base by regular visits and up-sale
• Established up-sale opportunities.
• Managed a team of 5 Sales representatives
• Drafted weekly sales report to the Head of Business Development in the UK. • Maintained a vibrant database of leads and customers
profile_positions.title: Business Development Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Supervised three teams in the Trade launch of Benson and Hedges Lights Cigarettes; gathered data of over 2000 retail outlet.

Key Duties:
• Established city marketing landscape design
• Assigned groups and persons to each region within the city
• Collected data concerning product sale - quantities per day and week.
• Collected consumer feedback on the Trade launch of Benson & Hedges Light Cigarette
profile_positions.title: Consumer Retail Census Enumerator & Team Supervisor

volunteer_experiences.description: Student Ambassador. Student Ambassador for the Department of International Business Administration (IBA).  Actively involved in providing insight into the program structure for intending students from the perspective of a current student of the program.

Intern. Student Research Intern for Faculty of Economics and Business Administration- FEWEB. Involved in collating data (examination results, examination samples), writing reports on program evaluation and feedback which was used to get the EQUIS (European Quality Improvement System) accreditation for the International Business Administration Program.
